trivia_items.text: Her given name is taken from the protagonist of The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, Dorothy Gale, while her surname may be taken from Lyman Frank Baum, the author of said novel.
Dorothy has the traits of a jerboa (Dipodidae sp.), with one being present in her Elite 2 artwork.
Along with Mayer and Ptilopsis, Dorothy is the only Rhine Lab Operator not illustrated by NoriZC. Her illustrator is instead Jacknife.
Because of her release being delayed for several months, Dorothy gained a significant increase of popularity and following in Global community players especially in EN server.
Dorothy using sand via vibration in her attacks and her traps is fitting, seeing the natural desert habitat of the jerboa.
Dorothy is the only friendly unit who is also an enemy unit whose enemy version is not a boss enemy.
sub_items: Dorothy can be used on operations where her enemy version is fought.
